thread.title: BRIEF-Diamond Trust Bank Kenya Posts FY Group Pretax Profit Of 10.10 Bln Shillings

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Diamond Trust Bank Kenya Posts FY Group Pretax Profit Of 10.10 Bln Shillings

organizations.name: brief-diamond trust bank kenya posts fy group pretax

text:
March 26 (Reuters) - Diamond Trust Bank Kenya Ltd:
* FY ENED DEC 2017 GROUP PROFIT BEFORE TAX OF 10.10 BILLION SHILLINGS VERSUS ‍​11 BILLION SHILLINGS YEAR AGO
* FY GROUP NET INTEREST INCOME OF 19.68 BILLION SHILLINGS VERSUS 19.39 BILLION SHILLINGS YEAR AGO
* DIAMOND TRUST BANK KENYA - DIRECTORS TO RECOMMEND PAYMENT OF FIRST AND FINAL DIVIDEND OF 65% (I.E. AT RATE OF 2.60 SHILLINGS PER SHARE) FOR YEAR 2017 Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
